Description: Fragment of oval handle to sharpish turn of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay fine light red-brown; cream slip. Rectangular stamp.
Curator's comments: Name Thestor. From the same die as Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum, KF322/1000322.
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (255)
